description: Epic Man (Jesse Conway) is a 13-year-old boy with reality-bending powers derived from his magic pencil.  He's part of the Epic Crew, a group of similarly aged friends who recently saved the world from a monstrous threat.  His personality is a mix of relatable teenage insecurities, quick wit, loyalty, and burgeoning heroism, all while navigating the complexities of friendship and self-discovery.
